function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Public places may become hotspots for disease transmission if ventilation rates are not maximized","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 and respiratory virus transmission in public areas","Mitigation":"Maximize ventilation rates in public places to reduce the infection risk","Technologies":"Utilize ventilation systems and air purifiers to maximize air circulation and filtration","People":"General public, employees, visitors","Owner":"Government, building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate scheduling and population distribution patterns in buildings may lead to increased infection risk","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission in buildings with poor scheduling and population distribution","Mitigation":"Implement uniform and climate-adaptive population distribution patterns to reduce infection risk","Technologies":"Utilize building management systems and occupancy scheduling tools","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, building operators"},{"Description":"Extended working hours and prolonged occupant presence in buildings can increase infection risk","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 transmission in buildings with prolonged occupant presence","Mitigation":"Shorten working hours and reduce occupant presence time to minimize infection risk","Technologies":"Implement automated building controls and occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors","Owner":"Employers, facility managers, building operators"}]}
